location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Ext 6363/42 'Supply of stationery to Cable and Wireless Ltd, Bushire'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence commences at the front cover with 1 and terminates at the inside back cover with 5; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: The file contains a request from the Political Resident in the Persian Gulf to the Secretary of State for India, requesting stationery for Cable and Wireless Limited, 'essential for war communications'.

name.namePart: Secretary of State for India and Burma, United Kingdom
